formalpara.title: Figure 1. Nematode sampling and isolation on an agar plate.
formalpara.para: A. Sampling bag in the field. Here some rotting fruits of Euterpe sp. (palm) in Nouragues, French Guiana. B. In the laboratory, the substrate (here rotting apples) is placed around the E. coli lawn onto a standard ‘C. elegans’ culture plate. C. Individual nematodes that crawl out can be picked onto new culture plates.
